name: Drunken Duel Boxing
description:
Welcome to the exciting world of boxing! Drunken duel: Boxing 2 Player has 3D physics-based combat simulation. This fun and simple wrestling game is suitable for kids. In this fighting game with 1p and 2p modes, wrestlers are waiting for you to become the best! Pay attention to the energy bar for a powerful shot and challenge your opponent with quick moves.

Come on, Raise your fist! Drop your opponent to the ground or force him out of the circle to win a match. Reach 5 points and become a boxing star in this exciting and competitive sports game!
